edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Class ActiveBoxBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.AbstractBox
            • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.BoxBag
              • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.ActiveBoxBag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resizable, Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveBoxGrid

    public class ActiveBoxBag
extends BoxBag
implements Cloneable
    This class is a special case of BoxBag, containing only ActiveBox objects. In addition to the members and methods of BoxBag, it implements specific methods to deal with ActiveBagContent objects and with other specific members of ActiveBox, like its "ids" (idOrder, idLoc and idAss).
    Version:
    13.08.28
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
